firstNightReminder: During Demon info, show the Demon three in-play characters instead of their normal bluffs.
name: Broker
ability: The Demon's bluffs are in-play characters.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Tattletale two character tokens, one in-play and one not in-play. (zzz)
name: Tattletale
ability: You start knowing a pair of characters, exactly 1 of which is in-play.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not in-play character token. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the Postmaster any not in-play character token. (zzz)
name: Postmaster
ability: Each night, learn a not-in-play character.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one evil alive neighbor. (zzz)
otherNightReminder: üëÅ Show the hand signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of alive Outsiders with at least one evil alive neighbor. (zzz)
name: Bootblack
ability: Each night, you learn how many alive Outsiders have an evil alive neighbor. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Parvenu was nominated today: üëÅ The Parvenu points to 3 players. (zzz) Those players are drunk. ‚óØ
name: Parvenu
ability: Each night*, if you were nominated by another player today, you may choose 3 alive players: they are drunk until dusk.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Understudy points to a player. (zzz) Tonight, if that player dies, the Understudy dies instead ‚óØ. (zzz) üëÅ Wake the chosen player. Show the "This player selected you" card, then the Understudy token. (zzz)
name: Understudy
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they die tonight, you die instead & they learn this.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Thespian points to a player. (zzz) If that player is the Demon, the Thespian dies ‚óØ and no one else can die tonight. ‚óØ
name: Thespian
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if you chose the Demon, you (and you alone) die tonight.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Smuggler points to any number of players. (zzz) If more than 1 of them is evil, the Smuggler dies. ‚óØ
name: Smuggler
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players: if more than 1 is evil, you die.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Matchmaker points at 2 players. (zzz) ‚óØ At dawn, if the players marked "Matchmade" differ in alignment and both live, one of them (not a Demon) dies.
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night*, choose 2 players (not yourself). Later tonight, if they are both alive & differ in alignment, 1 of them (not a Demon) dies.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If a player died tonight: üëÅ Point to a player who died tonight. Point to the category of the pointed-to character on the Witness' character sheet. (zzz)
name: Witness
ability: Each night*, learn what type of character killed a particular player tonight.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Rat-catcher died tonight: üëÅ The Rat-catcher points to a player: (zzz)Ô∏ñ If the chosen player is evil and the Rat-catcher was killed by the Demon: the chosen player dies. ‚óØ
name: Rat-catcher
ability: If you die at night, you are woken to choose a player: if they are evil & you were killed by the Demon, they die.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Inquisitor's target did not respond truthfully today: the target dies. ‚óØ
name: Inquisitor
ability: Once per game, in day, publicly ask 1 player a yes/no question. Tonight they die unless they replied truthfully (or are a Demon).

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Lightning Rod voted for all of today's nominations: place the "Safe" markers. ‚óØ
name: Lightning Rod
ability: Your alive neighbors cannot die at night if you voted for every alive nomination today (at least 1).

name: Snakebite
ability: You have a Townsfolk ability and think you are that Townsfolk. A good player among those chosen with your ability dies.

name: Rabble-rouser
ability: If a player would choose one of your neighbors with their ability, they might choose you instead.

otherNightReminder: ÔºüIf the Curator died tonight: üëÅ Wake the Demon. Show the "This character selected you" card, then Curator token. The Demon either shows a "no" head signal or points to a non-Demon character on their sheet and a player. (zzz) If they chose a player and a character: Replace that player's character token with the chosen character token. üëÅ Wake that player. Show the "You are" card, then the hand sign (thumb-up "good", thumb-down "evil") for the player's current alignment. (zzz)
name: Curator
ability: If you die, tonight, the Demon may choose a player & a non-Demon character they become (if not-in-play).

otherNightReminder: Ôºü If the Pariah was executed today: üëÅ Show the "You are" card, then the thumb-down "evil" sign. (zzz)
name: Pariah
ability: If you are executed, you become evil.

otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ If the Omen was "mad" about a particular fact today: you may change the gamestate to reflect that fact.
name: Omen
ability: Each night*, something you were "mad" about today might come true.

otherNightReminder: ÔºüIf one or more players are marked with the Gorgon's "Chosen" markers: üëÅ Point to each of the marked players. The Gorgon points to any number of them. (zzz) The chosen player(s) die. ‚óØ
name: Gorgon
ability: Each night*, you learn which players chose you with their ability tonight. Choose any number of them: they die.

firstNightReminder: Place the "Webbed" marker on the Tarantella's left Townsfolk neighbor. ‚óØ
otherNightReminder: Remove the "Poisoned" markers, if any. ‚óØ
name: Tarantella
ability: Your left Townsfolk neighbor is poisoned. Other Townsfolk for whom you vote or vote for you are poisoned until dawn.

otherNightReminder: ÔºüIf a good player was executed today: üëÅ  Wake that player. Show the "This character selected you" card, then Kleptocrat character token, then the "yes" head signal if the executed player neighbors the Kleptocrat, or the "no" head signal if not.
name: Kleptocrat
ability: If a good player is executed, good can no longer win. Executed good players know whether they neighbor you.

firstNightReminder: üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) ‚óØ
otherNightReminder: Ô∏ñ  If the marked player is dead: their alive good neighbors die ‚óØ. Otherwise: the marked player dies. üëÅ The Deathgripp points to a player. (zzz) ‚óØ
name: Deathgripp
ability: If the player you chose last night is alive, they die. If not, their alive good neighbors die. Each night, choose an alive player.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Spree points to a player and potentially a character. If they pointed to the player's character, the chosen player dies ‚óØ and you repeat this ability from the beginning. If they pointed to any other character, nothing happens. If they didn't point to a character, the chosen player dies. ‚óØ (zzz)
name: Spree
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may also guess their character: repeat this ability if right; otherwise, they live.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Rex points to a player. (zzz) The chosen player dies. ‚óØ
name: Rex
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your nominators (if Townsfolk) & 1 of their neighbors (if Townsfolk) are poisoned.

otherNightReminder: üëÅ The Veni Vidi Vici points to a player. (zzz) That player dies. ‚óØ
name: Veni Vidi Vici
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill yourself this way and no Outsiders live, evil wins instead. [3 Outsiders]

name: Matchmaker (later)
ability: This is a placeholder that allows Matchmaker to appear in the night order twice.
